reviews.review: Обожаю эту игру. Кемперов очень мало, также пофиксили то, что ман мог бить через окно за километр.
Parcă când juca IHATEPINK era mai usor.Fmm......

rank 20-10:

You know that feeling when you've gone downstairs to sneak a cheeky snack that your not meant to be eating, maybe a packet of crisps or a sweet, whatever you fancy, and then you hear your mum coming up the stairs with the power of Zeus behind her ripe and ready to beat you ass for taking the last Toblerone from one of those christmas sized packs? Welp that's the same feeling you get when playing as a survivor in this game. If you have a kink for shitting yourself as Michael Meyers tiers up while you and three of your friends sit on a generator just enjoying the company then this is the game for you.

As a killer you become the alpha. You know when you were little and you said one word out of turn, maybe a bad word or something offensive that you didn't realise was offensive because you're a kid, but then you hear your dad stand up from his leather chair, put out his cigar and charge towards you as your heartbeat grows louder and louder as impending doom approaches? Switch the roles and become your dad for a second, that's how you feel playing as killer. The sense of fear you instil into the baby survivors as they just try to remember everything they can from that one engineering class in school, desperately trying to fix a generator that somehow links up to a door that dad cant pass through so they can get the hell outta dodge is like a drug.

Rank 10-1:

Survivors bully killer with flashlights and pallets until the one player doing gens finishes and then everyone escapes leaving the killer to wonder why they ever decided playing one cheeky game of killer while waiting for their friends was a good idea.
アップデートする度にデータの改ざんを疑われ、整合性を確認しなければならない時点で、ゲームとして致命的だと感じます。ただちにこのバグを直していただきたいです。
Bu oyunu oynarken fazla geriliyorum xd (michael myers <3)

This game is a vile cesspool of microtransactions and toxicity. I've spent many hours and a shit load of money and it was all for not. please for the love of god do not buy this game. It will fill you with rage and regret.

A boring monotonous game in which you will be judged for every action of your game for a maniac. 
Camp - idiot
Tunnel - noob
Memento - noob which can`t do anything in the game without memento
Red addons - u should to die.
If u will camp,tunnel,have memento and red addons in 1 game survivords they will write in the chat about what a bad person you are using all their vocabulary.
If u play survivor and using the flash light maniac will tell you "you are toxic".
P.S. Don`t play DBD and all will be good ;)

вас будут обсирать в любом случае хоть вы выиграете или проиграете, но есть забава ели вы выигрываете за маньяка то вы можете получить бонус виде злобный каментариев.
i love the graphicks and it looks so real, the only downside is if you dont have friends to play with the queues are a bit longer.

Игра довольно классная, купил ее года 3-4 назад.Разработчики не забили на игру,но довольно многое предстоит исправить и добавить. Геймплея мне хватило на много, до сих пор периодически захожу поиграть. Игроки довольно токсичные, так же не идеальная оптимизация на процессоры amd. Смог играть на ультрах ток тогда когда обновил достаточно комп. Скажу честно, комп должен быть не слабый чтобы в нее играть. 7/10
对局吸引人，代入感较强。对新手玩家比较友好

还是好玩的。玩的越久越会发现人容易，鬼难。
萌新入坑的话别想溜鬼，会修机打qte就行。玩鬼就会看个足迹，知道个蓄力刀，会守电机就足够了。至于往后怎么玩就看自己风格了，要我自己的话不甘寂寞，喜欢溜屠夫，喜欢打四杀，当然翻车风险都是有滴，反正入坑是可以入得，还是很好玩的。
fun game, you can be angle or devel
Поиграть с друзьями или в соло за маньяка пару раз в неделю на расслабоне - 10/10. Если вам продолжает нравится эта игра после 300+ часов - удаляйте нахуй, пока не поздно
lindo tira pedos tiene la espíritu

Been playing this game for years.

Likes: 
The aesthetic and game play. 
Rush of adrenaline while playing this game.
The team work.
Game is constantly updated with new content or bug fixes.

Dislikes: 
Matchmaking times can vary from a few minutes to 10 minutes.
Luck of the draw regarding teammates - Your teammates can either be insanely helpful, or incredibly toxic.

Un juego sumamente divertido, no me arrepiento de haberlo comprado, todo un vicio y una jugabilidad impresionante, si quieres probar algo diferente a lo habitual Dead By Dayligth es el juego indicado, aunque aprender a jugar puede ser algo dificil pero de partida en partida vas aprendiendo mas.
